name: Association of Parents of Mentally Retarded Children

address: Vishnu Nagar, Opp. Bhagvati School Ground, Naupada

briefDescription: Adhar runs a residential institution taking life long care for mentally challenged adults since 1994. Presently 201 mentally challenged adults are residing at Adhar, Badlapur and 13 at Nashik. Its a concrete solution to the worry of old Parents of Mentally Challenged adults that "After us what? who will take care of my special child?"
